actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Edwards. Petition No: 108-14.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4423) making appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4423) making appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4423) making appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.
